comment.author: 80713190@N03
comment._content: Si tratta della chiesa di Sant'Irene!!!! Accanto alla Santa Sofia e non è mai stata trasformata in moschea, ma in museo delle armi e poi museo lapidario.

comment._content:
Thank you vilisia2012! We've updated the caption here and in our database. We kept the old caption as well because that's how it was originally labelled.
